properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
VESSEL FREE WIND REPORTS DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO LOSS OF STEERING. LAST KNOWN POSITION
VICINITY 22-18N 026-45W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC DAKAR,
PHONE: 22 133 826 5001, FAX: 22 133 826 5000.
